paper_abstract: We consider the following computational problem: given a family of generic univariate polynomials f := (f(0), ... ,f(s)), construct an algorithm to find polynomial perturbations u := (u(0), ..., u(5)) with "small" degrees such that the greater common divisor of the family of polynomials f + u has a "large" degree. In this paper, we propose an algorithm which solves this problem in polynomial time under a generic condition generalizing the normal degree sequence for the case s = 1. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Approximate GCD of several univariate polynomials with small degree perturbations
